overview: Battle Skipper is a Japanese direct-to-video animated series based on the small toy mecha action figures by Tomy. Battle Skipper The Movie is a compilation of the 3 episode OVA that focuses mostly on the girls of St Ignacio's School for girls than the mecha itself.
tagline: Can These Super-Powered Girls Save the World and Finish their Homework?
title: Battle Skipper The Movie
